SQLSatement.sql: SELECT MethodID, MethodName, MethodDesc, MethodType, FunctionType, CreateUser, Convert(varchar(30),CreateDate,120) CreateDate FROM dbo.InternalMethod WHERE DatabaseID={0} AND ClassifyID={1} AND (MethodName LIKE '%{2}%' OR MethodDesc LIKE '%{2}%' OR MethodType LIKE '{2}%' OR FunctionType LIKE '{2}%' OR CreateUser='{2}') ORDER BY MethodID desc
